snippet.title: House of Golf 2 Coming 16th August 2024!
snippet.description:
Created by fans of mini-golf and crazy golf, and inspired by games such as Micro Machines, players will navigate around over 100 incredible courses in visually stunning house environments with fun obstacles, traps, and hazards. With many crazy ways to play, face courses in single player or take on family and friends with up to 4-player multiplayer, whether at a party or playing competitively with regular tournaments such as the season opener championship, and leaderboard features. 

Developed with Unreal 5, House of Golf 2 takes the fun approach of mini-golf and brings it into the home with many of its unique and tricky challenges. Given the challenges, a free cam feature allows players to navigate the route around courses and help determine a strategy.

Join our Community!

Website: www.starlightgames.co.uk 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/starlightgames6 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starlightgames.uk/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61558754723563 
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@starlightgamesuk?lang=en
